us terms using the heart square pattern below as your swatch first make a square to test your gauge and check the squares are coming up to the correct size you may need to adjust your hook size swatch pattern heart square for testing gauge only not needed for part of the blanket design chain 4 slip_stitch into first chain to make a loop then round 1 4ch counts as 1dc 1ch 3dc 2ch 3 times 2dc slip_stitch into 3rd chain of beg 4ch round 2 slip_stitch in chain space 4ch counts as 1dc 1ch 2dc in same space *3dc ** 2dc 2ch 2dc in corner space repeat from * 3 times ending the last repeat at ** 1dc in starting space slip_stitch into 3rd chain of beg 4ch round 3 slip_stitch in chain space 4ch counts as 1dc 1ch 2dc in same space *3dc 1ch skip 1 3dc ** 2dc 2ch 2dc in corner space repeat from * 3 times ending the last repeat at ** 1dc in starting space slip_stitch into 3rd chain of beg 4ch round 4 slip_stitch in chain space 4ch counts as 1dc 1ch 2dc in same space *3dc 2ch skip 2 1dc in chain space 2ch skip 2 3dc ** 2dc 2ch 2dc in corner space repeat from * 3 times ending the last repeat at ** 1dc in starting space slip_stitch into 3rd chain of beg 4ch round 5 slip_stitch in chain space 4ch counts as 1dc 1ch 2dc in same space *4dc 2ch skip 1dc 1ch 1dc in next chain 1dc 1dc in next chain 2ch skip 1ch 1dc 4dc ** 2dc 2ch 2dc in corner space repeat from * 3 times ending the last repeat at
